"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We deduce that the function "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" gives a "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" correspondence between those "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k-"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"element subsets "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"X"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"[A] = 0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (when Khang wins), those with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"[A] = 1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (when Calvin wins), and those with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"[A] = 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (when Brian wins).The game is therefore fair."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3^n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" students sitting around the circle, then after the first round of counting there remain "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3^{n-1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" students and student "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S_0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" will count the same number "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in the second round."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So after "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" rounds, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S_0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" will be the last student remaining."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now suppose that there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2017"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" students."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3^6 = 729 < 2017 < 3^7 = 2187"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", we can reduce our problem to the previous easy case when there are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3^6"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" students left; then student "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S_k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" will be the student who will count "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" first among these "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3^6"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" students."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We need to remove "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2017 - 729 = 1288 = 2\times 644"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" students. "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"These correspond to "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"644"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" groups of three students (with two left out from each group)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"So we need "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"644\times 3 = 1932"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" students sitting before "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S_k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", and hence "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k = \boxed{1932}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
